oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Captain John Scott to Provost Marshal's Department at Loudon, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter from Captain John Scott, Company H, 25th Illinois Infantry is addressed to Quartermaster, 9th Tennessee Cavalry at the Headquarters for the Fourth Army Corps, Provost Marshal's Department. Scott writes, .If the sergeant does not get the man this time I shall lay the case before General Granger and some persons who are now screening the real offender will be caused some trouble."
